sentences.en: But for 2011 and beyond, the fiscal challenge is fearsome.
sentences.cn: 但2011年及以后的财政挑战,将令人触目惊心.

sentences.en: Gamic , the High Priest of Bo - hibba, in his fearsome ceremonial mask.
sentences.cn: 博西巴 的最高祭司加密科藏在他可怖的祭天面具后面.

sentences.en: He had developed a fearsome reputation for intimidating people.
sentences.cn: 他曾因恐吓他人而令人闻风丧胆。

sentences.en: He was dark - browed, grim and fearsome.
sentences.cn: 他眉毛浓黑,生性冷酷, 面目狰狞.

sentences.en: His bride - to - be was nervous fearsome of public opinion.
sentences.cn: 他的未婚新娘有些胆怯,怕人家飞短流长.

sentences.en: I am sure we would a fearsome duo up front.
sentences.cn: 我肯定我们能成为可怕的组合.

sentences.en: I drove for a while across this fearsome emptiness.
sentences.cn: 我开车开了好一阵穿过这片可怕的空旷之地。

sentences.en: Its fearsome appearance struck terror into their hearts.
sentences.cn: 它那可怕的样子使他们胆战心惊.

sentences.en: Komodo dragon is the largest living lizard and a fearsome predator.
sentences.cn: 科摩多龙是目前存在的最大蜥蜴,它是一种令人恐惧的捕食性动物.

sentences.en: Outside it was Luca Brasi whose reputation even then fearsome.
sentences.cn: 一看,是路加-布拉西,这个人的名声在当时也是令人不寒而栗的.

sentences.en: Outside it was Luca Brasi whose reputation even then was fearsome.
sentences.cn: 一看,是路加-布拉西,这个人的名声在当时也是令人不寒而栗的.

sentences.en: The battlefield was a fearsome sight.
sentences.cn: 这战场的情景触目惊心.

sentences.en: There was an indescribable flickering glow in his eyes, creating a fearsome and wholly unnatural effect.
sentences.cn: 他的眼里射出一种无法形容的闪烁的光辉, 给人以一种可怕的、完全不正常的感觉.

sentences.en: Though our challenges are fearsome, so are our strengths.
sentences.cn: 虽然我们的挑战是可畏的, 但我们的力量也是可畏的.

trans.tran_cn: 可怕的，吓人的，害怕的，胆小的
